name: Investmentgame
tagline: A MaDKit based implementation of the game theoretic investment game
body:
### Hello :)

This is InvestmentGame - a [MaDKit](www.madkit.org) (Java) based implementation of the well known "_investment game_". This game structurally resembles the game theoretic prisoner's dilemma.

The software has originally been written to support Jérôme's master's thesis in psychology where it will be used to perform an experiment for studying empathy for pain.

The program's software architecture is motivated by a generic proposal on "story-driven-development" - the so-called "Correlated Story" pattern.

Thus the InvestmentGame project (besides its application in Jérôme's thesis) also serves as a proof-of-concept for a story-driven software development approach. More information on the Correlated Story pattern will follow soon (hopefully).   

### Running the game
You should have [Java 7](http://www.java.com/de/download/) installed on your computer. 
To run the game, simply download the Zip file, extract it to any folder on your computer's hard drive and then double-click on the file `InvestmentGame.jar` in the main folder of the extracted archive.
